description.en: During the studies the students get general overview of the basic aspects in development of biological thought and research methodology. Different issues in bioethics and its importance in research will also be introduced.
description.et: Ainekursuses antakse tudengitele üldfilosoofiline ülevaade bioloogilise mõtte arengu ja teadusmetodoloogia alustest. Ainekursus käsitleb bioeetika erinevaid aspekte ja selle olulisust teadusmaalimas.

objectives.en: The aim of the discipline is to give students general knowledege of development of biological thought, research methodology, bioethics and the connections between them.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on anda tudengitele üldfilosoofilised teadmised bioloogilise mõtte arengust, teadusmetodoloogiast, bioeetikast ja nende omavahelistest seostest.

learning_outcomes.en:
1. Has a general overview about the principles of research planning and performing.
2.Is knowledgable in the issues of bioethics, its importance, history and contemporary trends.
3.Understands the theoretical background of research methodology and connections between methodology and research ethics.
4.Comprehends the rapid and wide developments in science and the regulatory issues.

grade_preconditions.et: Eksamile saamise eelduseks on oselamine vähemalt 80% loengutes ja seminarides ning esse kirjutamine ja ettekandmine.
